Description: Formal migration project initiation and team mobilization
Dependencies: Executive sponsor and AWS TAM availability
Deliverables: Migration charter and team assignments
Notes: AWS TAM engagement and account setup required

Description: Comprehensive inventory of on-premise infrastructure and applications
Deliverables: Complete infrastructure inventory and dependency map
Notes: Use AWS Application Discovery Service and manual assessment

Description: Analyze and categorize applications using 6 Rs migration strategy
Deliverables: Application assessment report with migration recommendations
Notes: Include complexity scoring and cloud readiness assessment

Description: Map application dependencies and integration points
Deliverables: Comprehensive dependency matrix and migration wave recommendations
Notes: Critical for wave sequencing and risk mitigation

Description: Evaluate network connectivity and bandwidth requirements for migration
Deliverables: Network assessment report and connectivity requirements
Notes: Include hybrid connectivity planning and bandwidth sizing

Description: Assess current security posture and cloud compliance requirements
Deliverables: Security assessment report and cloud security design
Notes: Include compliance framework mapping and gap analysis

Description: Design multi-account AWS environment and landing zones
Deliverables: AWS landing zone architecture and implementation plan
Notes: Follow AWS Control Tower and best practices

Description: Design migration waves based on dependencies and business priorities
Deliverables: Migration wave plan with detailed sequencing
Notes: Include rollback procedures and business impact assessment

Description: Develop cloud cost optimization and right-sizing recommendations
Deliverables: Cost optimization report and right-sizing recommendations
Notes: Include Reserved Instance and Savings Plan strategies

Description: Design migration factory processes and automation tooling
Deliverables: Migration factory implementation and process documentation
Notes: Include AWS MGN and custom automation tools

Description: Implement AWS landing zones and core infrastructure services
Deliverables: Operational AWS multi-account environment
Notes: Include security baselines and monitoring setup

Description: Establish hybrid network connectivity between on-premise and AWS
Deliverables: Operational hybrid network connectivity
Notes: Include VPN or Direct Connect setup and testing

Description: Implement cloud security controls and compliance framework
Deliverables: Implemented security controls and compliance validation
Notes: Include IAM policies and security monitoring

Description: Execute pilot migration with selected low-risk applications
Deliverables: Successfully migrated pilot applications
Notes: Include comprehensive testing and lessons learned documentation

Description: Execute first production migration wave
Deliverables: Migrated Wave 1 applications with validation
Notes: Include performance validation and user acceptance testing

Description: Migrate databases using AWS DMS and native tools
Deliverables: Migrated databases with zero data loss
Notes: Include data validation and synchronization testing

Description: Execute second production migration wave
Deliverables: Migrated Wave 2 applications with optimization
Notes: Apply lessons learned from Wave 1

Description: Execute final production migration wave
Deliverables: Migrated Wave 3 applications and remaining workloads
Notes: Focus on complex applications and dependencies

Description: Comprehensive performance testing of migrated applications
Deliverables: Performance test results and optimization recommendations
Notes: Include load testing and baseline comparisons

Description: Security validation and penetration testing of cloud environment
Deliverables: Security test results and remediation plans
Notes: Include compliance validation and vulnerability assessments

Description: Test backup and disaster recovery procedures in cloud environment
Deliverables: DR test results and procedure validation
Notes: Include RTO/RPO validation and runbook testing

Description: Business user validation of migrated applications and workflows
Deliverables: UAT results and business sign-off for all applications
Notes: Include training for business users and workflow validation

Description: Implement cost optimization recommendations and right-sizing
Deliverables: Cost optimization implementation and savings report
Notes: Include Reserved Instance purchases and resource optimization

Description: Optimize cloud applications for performance and scalability
Deliverables: Performance optimization implementation and metrics
Notes: Include auto-scaling configuration and monitoring enhancement

Description: Train IT staff on cloud operations and management
Deliverables: Training completion certificates and cloud operations readiness
Notes: Include AWS certification preparation and hands-on labs

Description: Train business users on application changes and new capabilities
Deliverables: User training completion and competency validation
Notes: Include workflow changes and new cloud-enabled features

Description: Create comprehensive cloud operations documentation and runbooks
Deliverables: Complete cloud operations documentation package
Notes: Include architecture diagrams and troubleshooting procedures

Description: Safely decommission on-premise infrastructure and validate data destruction
Deliverables: Decommissioning completion report and asset recovery
Notes: Include data destruction certificates and asset disposal

Description: Transition from migration team to cloud operations team
Deliverables: Operations handover completion and 24/7 support establishment
Notes: Include escalation procedures and support model activation

Description: Provide intensive support during initial cloud operations period
Deliverables: Hypercare completion report and stability metrics
Notes: Monitor system performance and user adoption for 30 days

Description: Measure and validate achieved migration benefits and ROI
Deliverables: Benefits realization report and ROI validation
Notes: Include cost savings validation and performance metrics

Description: Formal migration project closure and lessons learned documentation
Deliverables: Migration project closure report and lessons learned
Notes: Include team recognition and organizational knowledge capture
